price: Tàbí wọ́n ń wí pé: “Eléwì kan tí à ń retí àpadàsí aburú fún ni.”
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
